Those messages can be filtered by a special function.Quasi-administrator’s customization of ZeroNet For example, go tohttp://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/search userIDedgelordofdecentthen click “mute user”, and confirm.Nonsense information will not be displayed then.

That's a nice feature.
There are alternatives to Facebook, Twitter and Youtube. https://mewe.com/, https://parler.com/, and https://d.tube/. I know bitchute has already been mentioned. LBRY is also another option.
Google will sink Firefox when Mozilla's revenue is cut of. Only an opensource movement will keep it going. Best to switch to Opera.
